  1. from django.forms.widgets import ClearableFileInput
  2. from django.utils.safestring import mark_safe
  3. from easy_thumbnails.files import get_thumbnailer
  6. class ImageClearableFileInput(ClearableFileInput):
  7. template_with_initial = u'%(clear_template)s<br />'\
  8. u'%(input_text)s: %(input)s'
  9. template_with_thumbnail = u'%(template)s<br />'\
  10. u'<a href="%(source_url)s" target="_blank">%(thumb)s</a>'
  12. def __init__(self, thumbnail_options=None, attrs=None):
  13. thumbnail_options = thumbnail_options or {}
  14. thumbnail_options = thumbnail_options.copy()
  15. if not 'size' in thumbnail_options:
  16. thumbnail_options['size'] = (80, 80)
  17. self.thumbnail_options = thumbnail_options.copy()
  18. super(ImageClearableFileInput, self).__init__(attrs)
  20. def thumbnail_id(self, name):
  21. return '%s_thumb_id' % name
  23. def get_thumbnail(self, value):
  24. thumbnailer = get_thumbnailer(value, value.name)
  25. thumbnailer.source_storage = value.storage
  26. if hasattr(value, 'thumbnail_storage'):
  27. thumbnailer.thumbnail_storage = value.thumbnail_storage
  28. return thumbnailer.get_thumbnail(self.thumbnail_options)
  30. def render(self, name, value, attrs=None):
  31. output = super(ImageClearableFileInput, self).render(name, value, attrs)
  32. if not value or not hasattr(value, 'storage'):
  33. return output
  34. thumb = self.get_thumbnail(value)
  35. substitution = {
  36. 'template': output,
  37. 'thumb': thumb.tag(id=self.thumbnail_id(name)),
  38. 'source_url': value.storage.url(value.name),
  39. }
  40. return mark_safe(self.template_with_thumbnail % substitution)
